title: Starting as a Child Star - Novel Updates
tags: Age Regression   Child Protagonist   Childhood Love   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Possessive Characters   Reincarnation   Second Chance   System Administrator
author: Mo Xi Ke   墨西柯
description:
When Ye Luoyu broke up with Xu Lianyin, there was a riot, and they swore that they would never communicate with each other. 

As a result, they were suddenly reborn as childhood sweethearts╭(°A°`). 

Can we not take a nap together? 

Who would want to take a bath with him in a big tub! 

That day, Xu Lianyin said in the tone of a domineering president: “Heh, woman, I changed my teeth before you.” 

Then he smiled evilly, revealing his teeth.>
